column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I taking a train today from Boston , Massachusetts to New York City , New York .
#text=When I arrive at the station , I see an automated machine that lets me purchase my ticket .
#text=I enter the necessary information about my travel and my credit card information and it dispenses a ticket to me .
#text=I see that my train is leaving from track 12 .
#text=I follow the signs above me that show the directions to all of the track locations .
#text=The train pulls up about 10 minutes later .
#text=There are n't too many empty seats but I find a nice one next to the window .
#text=The train slowly pulls out of the station .
#text=About 20 minutes into the journey , a conductor comes by and asks to see my ticket .
#text=I show it to him and he punches a hole in it .
#text=He then rips off part of it and places the ripped part into a special see through pocket in my seat .
#text=This is so he knows that I have paid my fare to ride the train .
#text=It 's about a three hour train ride so I get up and wander a few cars down to the food train .
#text=I purchase a coffee and donut and bring them back to my designated seat .
#text=I 'm happy to say that there is free wi-fi on the train so I 'm able to surf the web while riding the train .
#text=We make a few stops along the way to New York to pick up more passengers and let others off .
#text=The three hours pass quickly and soon I 'm disembarking the train to enjoy a day in the city .
